tasks.label: Bank Summary 1 (test_data/bank)
tasks.command: source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate markdown-question-bank && export PYTHONPATH=src && python bank_summary.py --folder-path test_data/bank --num-alternatives 3

tasks.label: Bank Summary 2 (test_data/all)
tasks.command: source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate markdown-question-bank && export PYTHONPATH=src && python bank_summary.py --folder-path test_data/all --num-alternatives 3

tasks.label: Bank Summary 3 (test_data/all with Metadata Filters)
tasks.command: source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate markdown-question-bank && export PYTHONPATH=src && python bank_summary.py --folder-path test_data/all --num-alternatives 3 --exclude-metadata ES:Dificultad:Alta --exclude-metadata ES:TeachScore:1

tasks.label: Generate Quiz 1
tasks.command: source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate markdown-question-bank && export PYTHONPATH=src && python generate_quiz.py --folder-path test_data/all --outdir test_output --num-models 2 --num-questions 12 --num-alternatives 3 --shuffle-answers --num-cols 3 --lang GL --seed 1234

tasks.label: Generate Quiz 1.1 (with metadata filters)
tasks.command: source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate markdown-question-bank && export PYTHONPATH=src && python generate_quiz.py --folder-path test_data/all --outdir test_output --num-models 2 --num-questions 6 --num-alternatives 3 --shuffle-answers --num-cols 3 --lang GL --seed 1234 --exclude-metadata ES:Dificultad:Alta --exclude-metadata ES:TeachScore:1

tasks.label: Generate PDF 1.1 (fixed header)
tasks.command: source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate markdown-question-bank && timestamp_dir=$(ls test_output/ | tail -1) && ./generate_pdf.sh -d test_output/${timestamp_dir} -h test_files/head.md -c test_files/style.css

tasks.label: Generate PDF 1.2 (template header)
tasks.command: source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate markdown-question-bank && timestamp_dir=$(ls test_output/ | tail -1) && ./generate_pdf.sh -d test_output/${timestamp_dir} -h test_files/head.jinja2 -c test_files/style.css

tasks.label: Generate Quiz 2 (with topics)
tasks.command: source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate markdown-question-bank && export PYTHONPATH=src && python generate_quiz.py --folder-path test_data/bank --outdir test_output --num-models 2 --num-questions 6 --num-alternatives 3 --shuffle-answers --group-by-topic --num-cols 3 --lang GL --seed 1234

tasks.label: Generate PDF 2 (fixed header)
tasks.command: source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate markdown-question-bank && timestamp_dir=$(ls test_output/ | tail -1) && ./generate_pdf.sh -d test_output/${timestamp_dir} -h test_files/head.md -c test_files/style.css

tasks.label: Generate Quiz 3 (with excluded topics)
tasks.command: source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate markdown-question-bank && export PYTHONPATH=src && python generate_quiz.py --folder-path test_data/bank --outdir test_output --num-models 2 --num-questions 6 --num-alternatives 3 --shuffle-answers --group-by-topic --num-cols 3 --lang GL --seed 1234 --exclude-topic strings
